SELECT POPUP_STORE_ID, TITLE, NAME, OPEN_DATE, CLOSE_DATE, ORGANIZER, d.CREATED_AT as CREATED_AT, COUNT(*) over () total FROM TB_POPUP_STORE s JOIN TB_DEPARTMENT d ON s.DEPARTMENT_ID = d.DEPARTMENT_ID
OR s.TITLE LIKE '%' || #{request.query} || '%'
OR d.name LIKE '%' || #{request.query} || '%'
OR s.ORGANIZER LIKE '%' || #{request.query} || '%'
${order.property} ${order.direction}
OFFSET ${pageable.page}*${pageable.size} ROWS FETCH FIRST ${pageable.size} ROWS ONLY

SELECT * FROM tb_popup_store s JOIN TB_DEPARTMENT d ON s.DEPARTMENT_ID = d.DEPARTMENT_ID
AND title LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
AND trunc(SYSDATE) < open_date
AND ((#{startDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} BETWEEN open_date AND close_date) OR (#{startDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} BETWEEN open_date AND close_date))
OFFSET #{offSetRows} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{rowsToGet} ROWS ONLY

select popup_store_id, title, banner_img_url from tb_popup_store where popup_store_id in ( select distinct tr.popup_store_id from tb_reservation tr join tb_user_reservation tur on tr.reservation_id = tur.reservation_id where tur.user_id = #{userId} and tur.status = 1 and trunc(tur.created_at) = trunc(sysdate))

SELECT popup_store_id, title, open_date, close_date, place_detail, banner_img_url, organizer FROM tb_popup_store where sysdate <= close_date AND trunc(SYSDATE) > open_date ORDER BY views FETCH FIRST 5 ROWS ONLY
SELECT popup_store_id, title, open_date, close_date, place_detail, banner_img_url, organizer FROM tb_popup_store where sysdate <= close_date order by close_date fetch FIRST 5 ROWS ONLY

select * from tb_popup_store ps left join tb_popup_store_sns pss on ps.popup_store_id = pss.popup_store_id left join tb_popup_store_img psi on ps.popup_store_id = psi.popup_store_id left join tb_department td on ps.department_id = td.department_id where ps.popup_store_id = #{popupStoreId}

SELECT CASE WHEN EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM tb_user_reservation ur JOIN tb_reservation r ON ur.reservation_id = r.reservation_id JOIN tb_popup_store ps ON r.popup_store_id = ps.popup_store_id WHERE ps.popup_store_id = #{popupStoreId} AND ur.user_id = #{userId} AND ur.status = 1 AND trunc(ur.created_at) = trunc(sysdate) ) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS result FROM dual
select * FROM tb_popup_store where department_id = (select department_id from tb_popup_store where popup_store_id = #{popupStoreId}) and popup_store_id != #{popupStoreId} and sysdate <= close_date

SELECT POPUP_STORE_ID, TITLE, RESERVATION_ENABLED, SALES_ENABLED FROM TB_POPUP_STORE
USER_ID = #{userId}
AND SYSDATE BETWEEN OPEN_DATE AND CLOSE_DATE
ORDER BY CREATED_AT DESC

select ps.popup_store_id, ps.user_id, ps.department_id, d.name as d_name, ps.title, ps.organizer, ps.place_detail, ps.open_date, ps.close_date, ps.description, ps.event_description, ps.banner_img_url, ps.open_time, ps.close_time, ps.max_capacity, ps.interval_capacity, ps.reservation_interval, ps.reservation_enabled, ps.team_size_limit, ps.created_at, ps.chat_room_id, ps.views, pss.sns_id, pss.platform, pss.url, psi.popup_store_img_id, psi.img_url, psii.popup_store_item_id, psii.name, psii.amount, psii.img_url as store_item_img_url, psii.stock, psii.order_limit, psii.is_on_sale from tb_popup_store ps left outer join tb_department d on ps.department_id = d.department_id left outer join tb_popup_store_sns pss on ps.popup_store_id = pss.popup_store_id left outer join tb_popup_store_img psi on ps.popup_store_id = psi.popup_store_id left outer join tb_popup_store_item psii on ps.popup_store_id = psii.popup_store_id where ps.popup_store_id = #{popupStoreId}
mapper.insert:
select TB_POPUP_STORE_SEQ.CURRVAL from dual
INSERT INTO tb_popup_store ( user_id, department_id, title, organizer, place_detail, description, event_description, banner_img_url, entry_fee, max_capacity, reservation_enabled, reservation_interval, interval_capacity, team_size_limit, open_date, close_date, open_time, close_time, views ) VALUES ( #{user.userId}, #{department.departmentId}, #{title}, #{organizer}, #{placeDetail}, #{description}, #{eventDescription}, #{bannerImgUrl}, #{entryFee}, #{maxCapacity}, #{reservationEnabled}, #{reservationInterval}, #{intervalCapacity}, #{teamSizeLimit}, #{openDate}, #{closeDate}, #{openTime}, #{closeTime}, #{views} )
INSERT INTO tb_popup_store_item (popup_store_id, name, img_url, amount, stock, order_limit) VALUES (#{popupStore.popupStoreId}, #{name}, #{imgUrl}, #{amount}, #{stock}, #{orderLimit})
INSERT INTO tb_popup_store_sns (popup_store_id, platform, url) VALUES (#{popupStore.popupStoreId}, #{platform}, #{url})
mapper.update: merge into tb_popup_store_sns a using dual b on ( a.popup_store_id = #{popupStore.popupStoreId} and a.platform = #{platform} ) when matched then update set a.url = #{url} when not matched then insert ( popup_store_id, platform, url ) values ( #{popupStore.popupStoreId}, #{platform}, #{url} )

update.foreach: UPDATE tb_popup_store_item SET name = #{item.name}, amount = #{item.amount}, img_url = #{item.imgUrl}, stock = #{item.stock}, order_limit = #{item.orderLimit} WHERE popup_store_item_id = #{item.popupStoreItemId}
UPDATE tb_popup_store_item SET is_on_sale = 0 WHERE popup_store_item_id = #{item.popupStoreItemId}
